description: This file defines the PatientProvider class that manages fetching and storing patient profile data using an API client, following the ChangeNotifier pattern in Flutter.

classes.name: PatientProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages patient profile data, providing methods to fetch the current patient's profile and list patients.

methods.name: fetchMyProfile
methods.description: Fetches the current patient's profile via the API and updates internal state.

methods.name: listPatients
methods.description: Retrieves a list of patients with optional query parameters.
